item.description:
Our Stammtisch at the Pawtucket German-American Cultural Society!!!!

I wanted to change the date of our March-meetup to a week earlier. It is St. Patrick's Day weekend on the 17th, so I wanted to spread out the fun a little.

I hope you can all still make it on the 9th as well. I have loved seeing many of you lately.

Look forward to some good laughs and conversations and good beer in a couple of weeks!

Bis bald - viele Gruesse,

 

Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: At the Ratskeller - red door on the back of the building - look for a bunch of smiling people and the German Flag!
item.name: New Stammtisch at the Pawtucket German-American Cultural Society!!!
